tooltip:
Drone Centre (#2196/9400)
gregtech:gt.blockmachines
Machine Type: Drone Centre
Drone Center Controller
Drone #10032, cleared for takeoff!
Monitors multiblock machines in range.
Replace maintenance hatch on other multi with drone downlink module.
Provides maintenance, power control, monitoring and etc.
Range is determined by drone tier: T1-32, T2-128, T3-512
Place drones in input bus; only one needed to operate.
Automatically upgrade based on the drone level in the input bus.
There is a chance per second that the drone will crash.
Chance is determined by drone tier: T1-1/28800, T2-1/172800, T3-0
If machine is too far, remote control would not available
添加者：SilverMoon
-----------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------
按住 [LSHIFT] 以显示结构指导
由 Gregtech 添加
